metadata.description:
"Rugged" is a vibrant tableau blending the worlds of traditional craft and digital innovation. A pink carpet - symbolizing tactile comfort and domesticity - undergoes a dramatic metamorphosis, dunked in cold dark blue paint, mimicking the sometimes harsh reality of Web 3 and crypto communities. The striking interplay of colors reflects the exhilarating yet challenging integration of old norms with cutting-edge advancements.
The spectacle is mounted on standard plywood, fastened with a rusty nail, portraying the clash of the promise of a better future and the thorny side of old mindset scams in crypto and NFT spaces.
metadata.name: RUGGED #1/1
